casebody.data:
Ernest James NICHOLS
v.
Richard TERRY, Superintendent-Craggy Correctional Center; Frank L. Perry, Secretary of the North Carolina Department of Public Safety. No. 296P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. Ernest James Nichols, for Nichols, Ernest James. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for Terry, Richard, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Petitioner on the 20th of August 2015 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Mecklenburg County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
ERVIN, J. recused.
